content: around repeat pattern rounds 72-81 two more times repeat pattern rounds 72-80 once more a total of 110 rounds worked in slip_stitch plaid stitch top border work border rounds 1-2 twice bind off knitwise finishing weave in ends to inside block and lay flat pulling gently into shape and let dry visit follow share visit us follow us share with us #thelambandkid 740 winslow way east @thelambandkid and bainbridge island wa the lamb & kid #tlksliphappyplaidcowl www thelambandkid com the lamb & kid
